## Data Setup


```{r data}

library(lubridate)

fd <- now()-months(12)

data <- data.frame(label = c('Dust','Emergency','Noise','Odour','Waste','Water'),
                   value = c(104,19,638,1250,187,140),
                   color = c("#1B9E77","#D95F02","#7570B3","#E7298A","#66A61E","#E6AB02"))

```


## Usage with Standard Defaults
```{r simple}

pier(data)

```


## Advanced Usage

```{r advanced}

pier(data) %>%
    pie.size(inner=70, outer=100, width=500, height=500) %>%
    pie.title(text='Pollution Reports', font='Impact', location='pie-center') %>%
    pie.subtitle(text='by Segement Type') %>%
    pie.footer(text=sprintf('Pollution Reports Since %s', format(fd, '%a %B %d, %Y')),
               location = 'bottom-left') %>%
    pie.tooltips()

```
